item.title: ಐಡಿಸಿಯೆಲ್
item.description: Author: ಐಡಿಸಿಯೆಲ್ Editor Welcome to the Initiative on Dravidian Culture & Languages. translation not available at the momment. Initiative on Dravidian Culture and Languages (IDCL) aims to preserve and promote the linguistic and cultural diversity on India and beyond. The project has been established to improve the availability of resources and dedicate digital platforms for the enrichment of languages and cultures. The importance of language preservation has become a necessity in this age of globalisation.
